name: Whoopeeee
description:
You seem to have found these strange creatures with an extraordinary talent for proliferation... but to learn more about them you will have to isolate one at a time! Whoopeeee is sure to make you laugh, challenge you and have you debate whether you love or hate these pesky yet innocent looking things. 

- Esc to restart the level if it does not register the win condition (didn't manage to fix that bug)

- Throw with Goldilock power! Not too hard not too soft!

(Try lower sensitivity/ throwing more softly to avoid issues! Can update after jam if people would like)

If there was interest the design suits a touchscreen better I think.

This was my first game jam, and I made it alone:

https://twitter.com/GameDevRooney
